snippet: Nicolas Almagro of Spain advanced to the second round of the clay-court Argentina Open after defeating countryman Albert Montanes 6-3, 6-3....
lead_paragraph: Nicolas Almagro of Spain advanced to the second round of the clay-court Argentina Open after defeating countryman Albert Montanes 6-3, 6-3.

headline.print_headline: Almagro Defeats Montanes to Reach Second Round in Argentina
headline.main: Almagro Defeats Montanes to Reach Second Round in Argentina
